description: Retrieve logs from a Docker container. Packs request docker.logs via UDS; Rumi validates permissions and fetches the logs.

container_name.description: Name or ID of the container to fetch logs from

tail.description: Number of lines from the end of the logs to return. Optional.

since.description: Return logs since this timestamp (e.g. 2024-01-01T00:00:00). Optional.

stdout.description: Standard output logs from the container

stderr.description: Standard error logs from the container
